newsitem.title: INDIA: India's IPCA Laboratories 96/97 net up.
newsitem.headline: India's IPCA Laboratories 96/97 net up.

text.p: India's IPCA Laboratories posted a net profit of 170.6 million rupees ($4.77 million) in the 1996/97 year ended in March, compared with 150.4 million in the previous year, the Press Trust of India (PTI) said on Wednesday.
PTI said the company's total income rose to 2.69 billion rupees in 1996/97 from 2.18 billion in the previous year.
The company has set a dividend of 40 percent in 1996/97 against 27 percent in the previous year, the news agency said.
IPCA Laboratories' gross profit increased to 234.3 million rupees in 1996/97 from 195.8 million rupees in 1995/96, the PTI reported.
